patterns.name: Added
patterns.description: All changed lines are import/require/use statements (additions only). Supports single and multi-line imports in JS/TS, Python, Go, Rust, Java, C/C++, Ruby, C#, Swift, Dart.

patterns.name: Removed
patterns.description: All changed lines are removed import/require/use statements.

patterns.name: Reordered
patterns.description: The same set of imports exists before and after, in a different order.

patterns.name: Modified
patterns.description: All changed lines are import statements that were edited (paths changed, names added/removed).

categories.name: Formatting
categories.description: Whitespace and style changes with no semantic meaning

patterns.name: Whitespace
patterns.description: All changed lines are empty or whitespace-only. No code characters changed.

patterns.name: Line length
patterns.description: Code wrapped or unwrapped across lines. Joining and normalizing whitespace produces identical content.

patterns.name: Style
patterns.description: Only punctuation changed: semicolons added/removed, quote style (single â†” double), or trailing commas.

patterns.name: Added
patterns.description: All changed lines are comments. Detects line comments (// # -- ; %) and block comments (/* */ <!-- -->).

patterns.name: Removed
patterns.description: All changed lines are removed comments.

patterns.name: Modified
patterns.description: All changed lines are comments that were edited.

categories.name: Type Annotations
categories.description: Type annotation changes in typed languages

patterns.name: Added
patterns.description: Type annotations added to previously untyped code (e.g. `: int` in Python, `: string` in TypeScript). Stripping annotations leaves identical code.

patterns.name: Modified
patterns.description: Type annotations changed. Stripping annotations leaves identical code.

patterns.name: Removed
patterns.description: Type annotations removed. Stripping annotations leaves identical code.

patterns.name: Added empty
patterns.description: New file containing no code (empty or whitespace-only).

patterns.name: Moved
patterns.description: Identical content removed from one file and added to another.

patterns.name: Lock file
patterns.description: Package manager lock file (package-lock.json, yarn.lock, Cargo.lock, poetry.lock, etc.).
